name: Konung 3: Ties of the Dynasty
description: Konung III is a RPG, based on the Scandinavian and Slavic mythology, the third game in the Konung series (Konung: Legends of the North and Konung 2: Blood of Titans).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8 Processor: Intel Pentium 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: nVIDIA GF4 Ti4200 or ATI Radeon 7900 with 128 MB Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8 Processor: ntel Pentium 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: nVIDIA GF fx6800 or ATI Radeon 9800 with 256 MB or higher Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible

reviews.review_text: this game is impossible to play steam support is? well if i could contact them i would comment dont buy the game is my advice
